GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v4.19.247
GSD.description:
dlm: fix plock invalid read

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 5a1765adf9855cf0f6d3f7e0eb4b78ca66f70dee, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 586759f03e2e9031ac5589912a51a909ed53c30a. For more details please see the references link.
